body:
Comment 2: 
It would be great of gotest could operate outside the context of the go build system, 
but it's tricky. 

Right now gotest takes the contents of the *_test.go files, extracts the test methods 
and wraps a small harness around that, compiles it down, and executes it. But it 
won't know how to compile the module if you have a custom or complex compilation 
process.
